message:
<system-reminder>
💡 UPDATE COMPLETE - REMINDERS:
📈 PROGRESS: 25% complete - keep updating
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
💡 UPDATE COMPLETE - REMINDERS:
📈 PROGRESS: 75% complete - keep updating
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
✔️ SUBTASK COMPLETED - NEXT:
🔄 CHECK: Review if parent task needs updating
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📌 SUBTASK CREATED - TIPS:
💡 INFO: Subtask inherited parent's assignees
📊 TIP: Use progress_percentage in updates for auto status
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📊 TASK UPDATED - REMINDERS:
⏰ REMINDER: Continue updating every 25% progress
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📊 TASK UPDATED - REMINDERS:
⏰ REMINDER: Continue updating every 25% progress
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
✅ TASK COMPLETED - FOLLOW-UP:
💾 NEXT: Update context with learnings from this task
🎯 CONTINUE: Use 'next' action to find next task to work on
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
📊 TASK UPDATED - REMINDERS:
⏰ REMINDER: Continue updating every 25% progress
</system-reminder>

<system-reminder>
🤖 AGENT LOADED - READY:
🎯 ORCHESTRATOR LOADED: You can now coordinate all work
📋 START: List existing tasks or create new ones
⚠️ REMEMBER: This was a one-time load - don't call again this session
</system-reminder>
